About us

LLC "GRAIN HAS" is a producron and trading company
that unites highly qualified specialists to achieve success.
Our advantage is high competence and an individual professional approach to tasks of any level of complexity.

LLC "GRAIN HAS" - specializes in the purchase, sale, transportaron of grain and oil crops, producron of wheat flour and sunflower oil.

Products

THE COMPANY TRADES:

  • wheat

  • corn

  • sunflower seeds

  • rapeseed seeds

  • wheat flour

  • sunflower oil

Before shipping, each batch of products is sampled to ensure its quality

Certificate

We have an ISCC cerrficate, which makes it possible to supply agricultural products to a European producer for the further producron of biodiesel and other processing products. ISCC (Internaronal Sustainability and Carbon Cerrficaron) is an internaronal cerrficaron of sustainable producron and control of carbon emissions, which was created by the Associaron in Germany.

Obtaining a cerrficate means compliance with the requirements of careful use and protecron of land and water resources, control and assessment of greenhouse gas emissions that occur during the culrvaron, processing, storage and transportaron of grains.
